mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_user (id, time, name, mobile, password, password_continue_fails, is_password_locked, password_locked_time, is_allow_login, lock_time, login_count, last_login_time, last_login_client, last_login_ip, type, platform_account, is_freeSigningContract) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{passwordContinueFails,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isPasswordLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, #{passwordLockedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isAllowLogin,jdbcType=BIT}, #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastLoginClient,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{platformAccount,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isFreesigningcontract,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update t_user set time = #{time,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password_continue_fails = #{passwordContinueFails,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_password_locked = #{isPasswordLocked,jdbcType=BIT}, password_locked_time = #{passwordLockedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_allow_login = #{isAllowLogin,jdbcType=BIT}, lock_time = #{lockTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_count = #{loginCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, last_login_time = #{lastLoginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_login_client = #{lastLoginClient,jdbcType=TINYINT}, last_login_ip = #{lastLoginIp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, platform_account = #{platformAccount,jdbcType=BIT}, is_freeSigningContract = #{isFreesigningcontract,jdbcType=BIT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, time, name, mobile, password, password_continue_fails, is_password_locked, password_locked_time, is_allow_login, lock_time, login_count, last_login_time, last_login_client, last_login_ip, type, platform_account, is_freeSigningContract from t_user where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
